title: Greater Glyph of MR not available in Shop
body:
Is there no Greater Glyph of MR available in the Shop anymore? I've gone for the scaling ones now, but I'd rather have the flat ones.

Can anyone help?

Thanks in advance.

replies.body: I went ahead and checked your account because I had a sneaking suspicion.....as it turns out, you can't find those runes in the shop because you already own 9 of them, which is the hard limit.
